name: guest-agent
docker_compose_file:
services:
  dstack-agent:
    image: ubuntu
    user: root
    network_mode: host
    volumes:
      - /:/host/
      - /var/run/tappd.sock:/var/run/tappd.sock
      - /var/run/dstack.sock:/var/run/dstack.sock
    entrypoint: |
      bash -c '
      apt-get update && apt-get install -y socat
      socat TCP-LISTEN:2000,fork UNIX-CONNECT:/var/run/tappd.sock &
      socat TCP-LISTEN:3000,fork UNIX-CONNECT:/var/run/dstack.sock &
      tail -f /dev/null
      '
  dstack-verifier:
    image: dstacktee/dstack-verifier:0.5.4
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    restart: unless-stopped
